post.text: Trump's bigoted comments about a Latino judge are so disgusting, even other Republicans are offended.

replies.author: Daden
replies.text: There's been some heavily debated and almost argumentative arguments surrounding his comments that still continued today. It's extremely sad that Paul Ryan, who just endorsed him, said that his comments about the judge is the definition of being racist. His supporters say he's a "leader" and will do "anything" to do that job. What people don't understand is that there are both positive and negative leaders. Trump is not a positive leader.

replies.author: Shyanne
replies.text: I was tagging you in it because this was the interview I was talking about. But I agree. He will say anything to get elected bit he is not a positive leader. He is the epitome of the "average" angry American.
